title: Google Photos (Pixel 3a) stuck forever on getting ready to backup ... Items left.
content:
It's stuck on backing up 11 items for 3 days now, and it never backs them up (only photos, no videos). 
In turn, I can't backup further photos to clear up more storage space...

I already cleared cache and now cleared app data. 

So now, instead of getting the "getting ready to backup" message, I get a loop of Getting your photos message.

I tried everything, reboot, delete some items, uncheck all picture folders to be backed up, delete apps... My cellphone is 70% full, not that much that it wouldn't be able to backup.
